dcterms:description: A task defined by the authors to evaluate the ability of RNNs to memorize random inputs by reproducing the pth-from-last input in a sequence of random numbers.
dcterms:title: Random Memorization Task

dcterms:description: A task defined by the authors that involves memorizing a fixed-length sequence of random numbers, specifically designed to be easier than the random memorization task.
dcterms:title: Fixed-Length Random Memorization Task

dcterms:description: A method of generating random numbers used in the experiments to create input data for the RNNs.
dcterms:title: Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator
